metadata.title: Askim candles
metadata.description: Discover artisanal candles, wax figures, and gypsum products from Askim candles.

homepage.heroSubtitle: Explore our exquisite collection of handcrafted candles, unique wax figures, and elegant gypsum products.
homepage.ctaTitle: Crafted with Passion, Designed for You
homepage.ctaSubtitle: At Askim candles, we believe in the art of creation. Each piece is thoughtfully designed and meticulously crafted to bring warmth, beauty, and tranquility to your space.

productCard.addedToCartDesc: {productName} has been added to your cart.

accountLayout.loggedOutDesc: You have been successfully logged out.
accountLayout.logoutFailedDesc: Could not log you out. Please try again.

accountProfilePage.profileInfoDesc: View and update your personal details. Email for social logins is managed by the provider.
accountProfilePage.emailManagedByProvider: Email is managed by your identity provider and cannot be changed here.
accountProfilePage.phoneBackendNote: Storing phone numbers requires backend database integration.
accountProfilePage.pleaseLogin: Please log in to view your profile.
accountProfilePage.updateDemoDesc: Profile information noted. Actual update would require backend integration.

accountAddressesPage.manageAddressesDesc: Add, edit, or remove your shipping addresses.
accountAddressesPage.noAddressesYet: You haven't added any addresses yet.
accountAddressesPage.confirmDeleteDesc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this address.
accountAddressesPage.defaultAddressDescToast: This address is now your default.
accountAddressesPage.addressUpdatedDescToast: Your address has been successfully updated.
accountAddressesPage.addressAddedDescToast: Your new address has been saved.

accountOrderHistoryPage.title: Order History
accountOrderHistoryPage.description: View details of your past purchases.
accountOrderHistoryPage.noOrdersYetDesc: You haven't placed any orders with us. Start shopping to see your orders here!

accountLinkingPage.title: Account Linking
accountLinkingPage.description: Manage your connected social accounts for easier sign-in.
accountLinkingPage.connectedAccountsDesc: These accounts are currently linked to your Askim candles profile.
accountLinkingPage.linkFeatureComingSoon: Linking with {provider} is not yet implemented.
accountLinkingPage.unlinkFeatureComingSoon: Unlinking {provider} is not yet implemented. This would typically involve a backend call.
accountLinkingPage.unlinkNotAllowedDesc: You cannot unlink your only sign-in method.
accountLinkingPage.primarySignInMethodNote: This is your primary sign-in method. Unlinking may lock you out if no other methods are linked.

aboutUsPage.heroSubtitle: Discover the passion, craftsmanship, and inspiration behind every product we create.
aboutUsPage.ourStoryP1: Askim candles was born from a love for artisanal craftsmanship and the transformative power of scent. We believe that everyday items can be sources of joy and tranquility. Our journey began with a simple desire: to create high-quality, handcrafted products that elevate your space and soothe your senses.
aboutUsPage.ourStoryP2: From hand-poured candles with captivating fragrances to unique wax figures and elegant gypsum decor, each item is meticulously designed and crafted with care. We are dedicated to using quality materials and sustainable practices wherever possible.
aboutUsPage.passionDesc: Every item is made with love and attention to detail, ensuring a unique and high-quality product.
aboutUsPage.qualityDesc: We source the finest materials, from natural waxes to premium fragrance oils, for a superior experience.
aboutUsPage.inspiredDesc: Our products are thoughtfully designed to bring beauty, warmth, and a touch of elegance to your home.
aboutUsPage.communityDesc: We're more than just a store; we're a community of scent enthusiasts and lovers of handcrafted beauty. Follow us on social media and sign up for our newsletter for updates, new arrivals, and special offers.

cartPage.emptyCartSubtitle: Looks like you haven't added anything to your cart yet.
cartPage.itemRemovedDesc: {name} has been removed from your cart.
cartPage.cartClearedDesc: All items have been removed from your cart.

checkoutPage.paymentDesc: All transactions are secure and encrypted.
checkoutPage.orderPlacedDesc: Thank you for your purchase. Your order is being processed.

productsPage.searchNoMatch: Your search for "{searchTerm}" did not match any products.
productsPage.filterNoMatch: We couldn't find products matching your current filters.
productsPage.tryAdjusting: Try adjusting your search or filters.

loginPage.termsAgree: By signing in, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
loginPage.loginFailedDescGeneric: Could not sign you in. Please try again.
loginPage.loginComingSoonDesc: Sign in with {provider} is not yet available.

registerPage.confirmAccountInstruction: Your registration is nearly complete. For demo purposes, click the button below to confirm your account. In a real application, you would receive a confirmation email.

authContextToasts.accountNotConfirmed: Account not confirmed. Please complete registration or check your confirmation email.
authContextToasts.noPendingReg: No pending registration found to confirm or registration incomplete.
authContextToasts.confirmFailedUserNotFound: Could not find user to confirm.
authContextToasts.loggedOutSuccess: You have been successfully logged out.
